attributes.title: Sundance Diary #1
attributes.caption: Eric Vespe reports from Sundance Film Festival on Blindspotting, Private Life, Beast, and American Animals.
attributes.description: Eric Vespe braves Park City, Utah for Sundance Film Festival 2018. He's seeing all the movies studios are competing to buy and bringing back reports on what to watch for. In this diary: Blindspotting, Private Life, Beast, and American Animals.

attributes.title: Sundance Diary #2
attributes.caption: Eric Vespe is trying to see every good movie at Sundance Film Festival and making a pretty solid dent! He's got more recommendations for upcoming movies you should keep an eye on.
attributes.description: Eric Vespe is trying to see every good movie at Sundance Film Festival and making a pretty solid dent! He's got more recommendations for upcoming movies you should keep an eye on.

attributes.title: Sundance Diary #3
attributes.caption: Eric does his best to see all the great movies Sundance has to offer and let you know which ones to keep an eye out for when they come to theaters.
attributes.description: Eric does his best to see all the great movies Sundance has to offer and let you know which ones to keep an eye out for when they come to theaters.

attributes.title: Sundance Diary #4
attributes.caption: That's a wrap on Sundance 2018! Eric goes over it all and offers his thoughts.
attributes.description: That's a wrap on Sundance 2018! Eric goes over it all and offers his thoughts.

attributes.title: Academy Awards 2018 Predictions
attributes.caption: Eric and Jon sit down to go over the biggest nominees for the 9th Academy Awards to predict who will get to buy their own golden statues.
attributes.description: Eric and Jon sit down to go over the biggest nominees for the 9th Academy Awards to predict who will get to buy their own golden statues.

attributes.title: Broken Lizard Talks Super Troopers 2
attributes.caption: Eric sits down with the Broken Lizard cast to talk about the upcoming Super Troopers 2, crowdfunding, and more!
attributes.description: Eric sits down with the Broken Lizard cast to talk about the upcoming Super Troopers 2, crowdfunding, and more!

attributes.title: Cinemacon Diary #1
attributes.caption: Eric Vespe's on-site at CinemaCon, checking out upcoming movies and getting sneak peeks at stuff like Venom. Here's everything he saw the first day!
attributes.description: Eric Vespe's on-site at CinemaCon, checking out upcoming movies and getting sneak peeks at stuff like Venom. Here's everything he saw the first day!

attributes.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom with J.A. Bayona
attributes.caption: We sit down with Jurassic Park: Fallen Kingdom director J.A. Bayona to talk collaborating with Steven Spielberg, working with practical dinosaurs, and making the series scarier.
attributes.description: We sit down with Jurassic Park: Fallen Kingdom director J.A. Bayona to talk collaborating with Steven Spielberg, working with practical dinosaurs, and making the series scarier.
